atg.repository.search.indexing.submitter
Class BpiDocumentSubmitter

java.lang.Object
  atg.nucleus.GenericService
      atg.repository.search.indexing.submitter.BpiDocumentSubmitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminableService, ApplicationLogging, ComponentNameResolver, DocumentSubmitter, java.util.EventListener, NameContextBindingListener, NameContextElement, NameResolver, Service, ServiceListener
public class BpiDocumentSubmitter
extends GenericService
implements DocumentSubmitter

An implementation of DocumentSubmitter that submits documents via the BPI (Batch Push Interface).

Created: March 04 2005

public static final java.lang.String CONTENT_TEMPLATE_ATTRIBUTE_NAME

setBpiBusyExceptionMessageStrings

public void setBpiBusyExceptionMessageStrings(java.lang.String[] pBpiBusyExceptionMessageStrings)
Set an array of strings from BpiExceptions that are found in exceptions thrown when the server is busy. If matched, then throw a DocSubmitterBusyIndexingException.

getBpiBusyExceptionMessageStrings

public java.lang.String[] getBpiBusyExceptionMessageStrings()
Get an array of strings from BpiExceptions that are found in exceptions thrown when the server is busy. If matched, then throw a DocSubmitterBusyIndexingException.

beginSession

public DocumentSubmitterSession beginSession(java.lang.String pIndexingMode)
                                      throws IndexingException
Begin a document submitter session. This is invoked at the beginning of an indexing run.

Specified by:
beginSession in interface DocumentSubmitter
Parameters:
pIndexingMode - Should be "Full" for a full index, "Incremental" for incremental.
Throws:
IndexingException

endSession

public void endSession(DocumentSubmitterSession pSubmitterSession)
                throws IndexingException

Throws:
IndexingException

cancelSession

public void cancelSession(DocumentSubmitterSession pSubmitterSession)
                   throws IndexingException
